High-level component:

```js
<CDKGlobalHeader appName="My application" fixed={false} />
```

High-level component with clickable logo:

```js
<CDKGlobalHeader
  appName="My application"
  onClickLogo={() => alert("Click!")}
  fixed={false}
/>
```

High-level component with icons:

```js
<CDKGlobalHeader appName="App name" fixed={false}>
  <GlobalHeaderIcons>
    <GlobalHeaderIcon>settings</GlobalHeaderIcon>
    <GlobalHeaderIcon>help</GlobalHeaderIcon>
    <GlobalHeaderIcon>person</GlobalHeaderIcon>
  </GlobalHeaderIcons>
</CDKGlobalHeader>
```

High-level component with menu:

```js
class CDKGlobalHeaderExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { menuOpen: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <CDKGlobalHeader appName="App name" fixed={false}>
        <GlobalHeaderIcons>
          <React.Fragment>
            <GlobalHeaderIcon onClick={() => this.setState({ menuOpen: true })}>
              person
            </GlobalHeaderIcon>
            <MenuAnchor>
              <Menu
                open={this.state.menuOpen}
                onSelected={() => this.setState({ menuOpen: false })}
                onCancel={() => this.setState({ menuOpen: false })}
              >
                <MenuItem>Profile</MenuItem>
                <MenuDivider />
                <MenuItem>Log out</MenuItem>
              </Menu>
            </MenuAnchor>
          </React.Fragment>
        </GlobalHeaderIcons>
      </CDKGlobalHeader>
    );
  }
}

<CDKGlobalHeaderExample />;
```

High-level component with app-switcher:

```js
<CDKGlobalHeader appName="App name" brand="CDK" fixed={false}>
  <GlobalHeaderIcons>
    <GlobalHeaderAppSwitcher home="Back to Connect Portal">
      <AppSwitcherItem>
        <AppSwitcherItemIcon>contacts</AppSwitcherItemIcon>
        <AppSwitcherItemText>Admin</AppSwitcherItemText>
      </AppSwitcherItem>

      <AppSwitcherItem>
        <AppSwitcherItemIcon>directions_car</AppSwitcherItemIcon>
        <AppSwitcherItemText>Vehicle</AppSwitcherItemText>
      </AppSwitcherItem>

      <AppSwitcherItem>
        <AppSwitcherItemIcon>phone</AppSwitcherItemIcon>
        <AppSwitcherItemText>Prospect</AppSwitcherItemText>
      </AppSwitcherItem>
    </GlobalHeaderAppSwitcher>
  </GlobalHeaderIcons>
</CDKGlobalHeader>
```
